title: Recursion Patterns Quiz
description: Check recursion essentials and safety checks.

questions.question: A recursive solution must include:
questions.explanation: Without a base case, recursion does not terminate correctly.

questions.question: Each recursive call should:
questions.explanation: Progress toward termination is required to avoid infinite recursion.

questions.question: Why combine recursive call results?
questions.explanation: Many recursive problems need result composition from subproblems.

questions.question: Missing base case most likely causes:
questions.explanation: Calls continue indefinitely until stack limits are exceeded.
